ActConsoleCommand.Description: copy the data from PROD to PPROD directory part 1

ActInputValue.Value: cd /users/{Var Name=MMC ENV for PROD PATH}/tlg_home/data/switch/prod

ActConsoleCommand.Description: copy the data from PROD to PPROD directory part 2

ActInputValue.Value: cp swtable* /users/{Var Name=MMC ENV for PROD PATH}/var/mmo/projs/sc/SCGRD/dat

Excel Action - Save the Device Queries

VariableString.InitialStringValue: UPDATE OUTPUT_ACTION set FIELD_VALUE='WEB52' WHERE FIELD_VALUE='WEB' AND FIELD LIKE 'APNDATA.%.pdp.refPdpContextName';
